title: Hour 1 - Chargers/Chiefs Preview and How to Watch the Game
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Chargers/Chiefs Preview and How to Watch the Game
description:
Dan breaks down what's on the line for the Chargers and Chiefs in tonight's Thursday Night Football Game, and he and the Danette's try to figure out how to watch the game that will only be available streaming on Amazon Prime Video.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
